enable.title: Enable
enable.description: Whether devices should be automatically discovered using mDNS.

interface.title: Network interface
interface.description: The network interface to use when sending and receiving mDNS packets. You probably don't need to use this setting unless you know what you're doing. If not specified, all available network interfaces will be used.

requestTimeout.title: Request timeout
requestTimeout.description: The time, in seconds, to wait for a response before a request is aborted.

pingInterval.title: Ping interval
pingInterval.description: The interval, in seconds, at which ping requests should be made to verify that the connection is open. Set to 0 to disable.

reconnectInterval.title: Reconnect intervals
reconnectInterval.description: The interval, in seconds, at which a connection attempt should be made after a socket has been closed. Multiple intervals can be specified as a comma-separated list of numbers. Set to 0 to disable.

id.title: Device ID
id.description: See this page for instructions on how to find your device's ID.

name.title: Name
name.description: This name will be shown in the homebridge log and will be used as the default name when the device is added to HomeKit. Note though that setting this value after the device has been added will not change the name in HomeKit.

hostname.title: IP address or hostname
hostname.description: Set this value if your device can't be discovered automatically.

password.title: Password
password.description: The password to use if the Shelly device requires authentication.

coverType.title: Cover type
coverType.description: If Shelly is in cover mode, choose how it should appear in HomeKit. This is only relevant if the device is in cover mode, otherwise it will be ignored. Default is Windows Covering.

layout.title: Devices
layout.description: Use these settings to configure individual devices. Note though that unless your devices can't be discovered using mDNS, you don't necessarily have to add them here manually.
